name: part_007
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】遅れたけど、誕生日3Dライブやります！ ⧸  BIRTHDAY 3D LIVE！【#戌神ころね生誕祭2022】 [Zvb8xKmP-9U]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Inugami Korone continues her high-energy performance of 'Be The One'.
The scene transitions to a beach setting with a brief blackout.
Inugami Korone is joined by Houshou Marine, Shirogane Noel, and Yukihana Lamy for a cover of 'Flying Get' on a virtual beach.
scenes.song_name: フライングゲット (Flying Get)

subtitles.original: みんな感じてる　J-U-W-E-L
subtitles.english: Everyone is feeling it, J-U-W-E-L

subtitles.original: Be The One, Be The One, We will
subtitles.english: Be The One, Be The One, We will

subtitles.original: 必ず夜明けは巡ってくるから
subtitles.english: Because the dawn will surely come around

subtitles.original: Be The Light, Be The Light, We will
subtitles.english: Be The Light, Be The Light, We will

subtitles.original: 未来へつなごう　過去をいたわろう
subtitles.english: Let's connect to the future, let's cherish the past

subtitles.original: 現代を生きよう　そして忘れない
subtitles.english: Let's live the present and not forget

subtitles.original: 奇跡と偶然　太陽と月
subtitles.english: Miracles and coincidences, the sun and the moon

subtitles.original: Be The One, Be The Light
subtitles.english: Be The One, Be The Light

subtitles.original: メッセージ届くよ
subtitles.english: The message will reach you

subtitles.original: 刻むよ
subtitles.english: I'll engrave it

subtitles.original: Be The One, Be The One, We will
subtitles.english: Be The One, Be The One, We will

subtitles.original: make all your sight we'll be the one
subtitles.english: make all your sight we'll be the one

subtitles.original: Be The Light, Be The Light
subtitles.english: Be The Light, Be The Light

subtitles.original: We'll take darkness into brightness yeah
subtitles.english: We'll take darkness into brightness yeah

subtitles.original: Leading you into the light, Be the Light
subtitles.english: Leading you into the light, Be the Light

subtitles.original: Oh you will be alive
subtitles.english: Oh you will be alive

subtitles.original: Be The One, Be The One
subtitles.english: Be The One, Be The One

subtitles.original: You will be the one
subtitles.english: You will be the one

subtitles.original: We'll make a way
subtitles.english: We'll make a way

subtitles.original: Na na na na na na na na na na na na...
subtitles.english: Na na na na na na na na na na na na...

subtitles.original: ギラギラ容赦ない太陽が
subtitles.english: The relentless, blazing sun

subtitles.original: 強気で照りつける On the beach
subtitles.english: Shines down boldly on the beach

subtitles.original: うぬぼれ温度は急上昇
subtitles.english: The conceit temperature is rising rapidly

subtitles.original: 落ち着かないのは 真夏の性だな
subtitles.english: Being restless is just the nature of midsummer

subtitles.original: ふたり 目が合えば なぜか 逸らすのに
subtitles.english: When our eyes meet, for some reason you look away

subtitles.original: 僕は またすぐ見てしまう 君のこと
subtitles.english: But I'm looking at you again immediately

subtitles.original: もしかして もしかして
subtitles.english: Could it be, could it be

subtitles.original: フライングゲット 僕は一足先に
subtitles.english: Flying Get, I'll be one step ahead

subtitles.original: 君の気持ち 今すぐ手に入れようか
subtitles.english: Shall I take hold of your feelings right now?

subtitles.original: フライングゲット 何か言われる前に
subtitles.english: Flying Get, before anything is said

subtitles.original: 心のうちは ビビッと感じたままに
subtitles.english: Feeling the spark in my heart as it is

subtitles.original: 誰がいても 誰がいても 微笑み方に
subtitles.english: No matter who's there, no matter who's there, in the way you smile

subtitles.original: 君が僕に 恋をしてるのは明確
subtitles.english: It's clear that you're in love with me

subtitles.original: フライングゲット だから 誰より早く
subtitles.english: Flying Get, so faster than anyone else

subtitles.original: 君のハートのすべて 僕のものさ
subtitles.english: The whole of your heart belongs to me

subtitles.original: 好きだから
subtitles.english: Because I love you

subtitles.original: ラブ・フラゲ！
subtitles.english: Love Flage!

subtitles.original: クラクション鳴らした順序で
subtitles.english: In the order the horns were honked

subtitles.original: 砂浜歩いてた ビキニ
subtitles.english: The bikini walking on the sandy beach

subtitles.original: 告白ウェルカム さあおいで
subtitles.english: Confession welcome, come on over

subtitles.original: 素直にならなきゃ 楽しくないぜ
subtitles.english: If you're not honest, it's no fun

subtitles.original: 不意に誘ってる 僕を見て
subtitles.english: Suddenly inviting, look at me

subtitles.original: 期待させて
subtitles.english: Giving me expectations

subtitles.original: それなら 妄想したって 声を
subtitles.english: In that case, even if I fantasize, a voice...

subtitles.original: かけてみなきゃ 始まらない
subtitles.english: ...if I don't try calling out, it won't start

subtitles.original: フライングゲット 君に空振りしても
subtitles.english: Flying Get, even if I swing and miss with you

subtitles.original: 当たって砕けろ 男じゃないか
subtitles.english: Go for broke, aren't you a man?

subtitles.original: フライングゲット いつも やりたい放題
subtitles.english: Flying Get, always doing whatever I want

subtitles.original: 黙って見てても 恋は売り切れるよ
subtitles.english: Even if you watch in silence, love will be sold out

subtitles.original: 勇み足でも 勇み足でも 一番乗りで
subtitles.english: Even if overeager, even if overeager, being the first to arrive

subtitles.original: 僕と君に そこそこなのは 不相応
subtitles.english: Something average for you and me is unfitting

subtitles.original: フライングゲット ようやく 待ってたような
subtitles.english: Flying Get, finally, it seems I've been waiting

subtitles.original: 周りの男たちを 出し抜いて
subtitles.english: Outsmarting the men around you

subtitles.original: 得意げに
subtitles.english: Proudly

subtitles.original: ラブ・フラゲ！
subtitles.english: Love Flage!

subtitles.original: フライングゲット 僕は一足先に
subtitles.english: Flying Get, I'll be one step ahead

subtitles.original: 君の気持ち 今すぐ手に入れようか
subtitles.english: Shall I take hold of your feelings right now?

subtitles.english: Flying Get
